sentences.en: Among her many virtues are loyalty, courage, and truthfulness.
sentences.cn: 她有许多的美德,如忠诚 、 勇敢和诚实.

sentences.en: Despite her sharp tongue, she inspires loyalty from her friends.
sentences.cn: 尽管她说话尖刻，却得到了朋友们的忠心。

sentences.en: Elizabeth understood her husband’s loyalty to his sister.
sentences.cn: 伊丽莎白理解丈夫对他姐姐的一片忠心。

sentences.en: He inspires fierce loyalty in his friends.
sentences.cn: 他激发了朋友们对他的无比忠诚。

sentences.en: His loyalty to his friends was never in doubt.
sentences.cn: 他对朋友的一片忠心从来没受到怀疑.

sentences.en: No one could ever doubt her loyalty.
sentences.cn: 谁也不会怀疑她的忠诚.

sentences.en: Once he took the vow his loyalty never wavered.
sentences.cn: 一旦他发了誓,他的忠诚从不动摇.

sentences.en: She told him the truth from a sense of loyalty.
sentences.cn: 她告诉他真相是出于忠诚.

sentences.en: the agony of divided loyalties (= loyalty to two different or opposing people ) for the children in a divorce
sentences.cn: 父母离婚过程中孩子两面都要依顺的痛苦

sentences.en: The time for loyalty is past.
Their loyalty only went so far.
sentences.cn: 他们的忠诚只能到这个程度。

sentences.en: There were too many other demands on his loyalty now.
sentences.cn: 现在还有太多其他的事情也要求他忠心。

sentences.en: They remain unshaken in their loyalty.
They swore an oath of loyalty to the country.
They swore their loyalty to the king.

trans.tran_cn: 忠诚，忠实，忠心，忠于…感情
trans.tran_en: the quality of remaining faithful to your friends, principles, country etc
